title: Fortalice CEO on Security-Camera Data Hack
itunes:title: Fortalice CEO on Security-Camera Data Hack
description:
Theresa Payton, CEO at Fortalice, discusses news of a large-scale security-camera data hack this week. She also talks about the increasing amounts of data that smart devices are collecting.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
